title: Samsung Galaxy - The Complete Manual (10th Ed)(gnv64)

Samsung Galaxy The Complete Manual (10th Ed)
English | 132 pages | PDF | 17 mb

Samsungâ€™s Galaxy range of mobile devices has not only been the most popular Android devices over the past few years, it has also set the bar when it comes to mobile innovation. Whether itâ€™s the S6 and S6 Edge and the newest S6 Edge+, Tab A or Note, each Galaxy combines superb hardware with a range of fantastic built-in
software. In this revised edition of Samsung Galaxy The Complete Manual, we take you through everything you need to know to get the most from your Galaxy. From how to make use of your deviceâ€™s built-in camera, to which essential apps to download, read on to get started on your way to becoming a Galaxy expert.
